company: Acerta Pharma B.V. (A member of the AstraZeneca Group)
job_text: ['', 'PhD and/or MD with experience in oncology drug development. ', 'Experience in building partnerships and leveraging relationships with cross functional teams. ', 'Experience working with primary human clinical trial samples. Experience in building partnerships and leveraging relationships with cross functional teams. Able to work independently with minimal supervision. Must have excellent oral and written communication skills. ', 'Able to work independently with minimal supervision. ', 'We are seeking a highly motivated Associate Director, Translational Medicine to join a world class center for discovery and development of innovative cancer medicines at Acerta Pharma, an AstraZeneca Company, based in South San Francisco, CA. The successful candidate will be reporting to the Head of the Translational Medicine Group and will be responsible to deliver the translational strategies across a portfolio of medicines in various stages of clinical development in hematology-oncology. ', 'The ideal candidate should be familiar with several technical methodologies and platforms used for analyzing high-content flow cytometry and genomic data sets (NGS and RNASeq etc). ', 'Disclaimer: The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed by people assigned to this classification. They are not to be constructed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties, and skills required of personnel so classified. All personnel may be required to perform duties outside of their normal responsibilities from time to time, as needed. ', 'Deriving      biomarker strategies based on biology data (internal/external datasets)      and implementing within project teams. ', 'Will be part of cross-functional clinical study management teams (SMT) to lead biomarker/translational strategy and collaborate with clinical operations teams to implement exploratory sample collection and analyses in clinical studies. ', 'Should be able to own      and contribute to the biomarker/diagnostic related sections in the      clinical study protocols, CSRs, and biomarker analysis plans/reports etc. ', 'Supervising/managing      lab staff may be required. ', 'Must      be able to lead cross-functional biomarker teams to oversee the delivery      of biomarker/diagnostic strategy and interpreting the data related to      individual research/clinical development projects. ', 'Acerta Pharma is an equal opportunity employer and considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, creed, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, age, disability, or Vietnam era, or other eligible veteran status, or any other protected factor.', 'Key Responsibilities', ' Proven experience as an effective scientist and a team      player with great motivation.  Should be able to fit into a fast-paced work      environment with changing project priorities.  ', 'Measure pharmacodynamic markers reliably and quantifiably to inform clinical decisions for selecting therapeutically relevant dose/schedules. ', 'Lead      external academic collaborations on novel biomarker/combination focus. ', ' Lead      external academic collaborations on novel biomarker/combination focus.  Should be able to own      and contribute to the biomarker/diagnostic related sections in the      clinical study protocols, CSRs, and biomarker analysis plans/reports etc.  Collaborate      with cross functional teams (global working teams) including biology,      translational medicine, and clinical operations etc.  Understanding      novel mechanisms of resistance to targeted therapies.  Work      with cross functional leadership to integrate translational support across      oncology pipeline.  Publish      work in high quality scientific journals and present at internal/external      scientific meetings.  Supervising/managing      lab staff may be required.  ', ' ', 'Understanding      novel mechanisms of resistance to targeted therapies. ', 'PhD and/or MD with experience in oncology drug development. Deep knowledge in disease biology/translational science, with experience in pharmaceutical industry with a focus in Hematology-Oncology. Must have expertise in oncology, cancer cell signaling pathways, biomarker assay development, and translational biology research. The ideal candidate should be familiar with several technical methodologies and platforms used for analyzing high-content flow cytometry and genomic data sets (NGS and RNASeq etc). ', 'Requirements and Qualifications', 'Must have excellent oral and written communication skills. ', ' Deriving      biomarker strategies based on biology data (internal/external datasets)      and implementing within project teams.  Must      be able to lead cross-functional biomarker teams to oversee the delivery      of biomarker/diagnostic strategy and interpreting the data related to      individual research/clinical development projects.  ', 'Deep knowledge in disease biology/translational science, with experience in pharmaceutical industry with a focus in Hematology-Oncology. ', 'Publish      work in high quality scientific journals and present at internal/external      scientific meetings. ', 'Should be able to fit into a fast-paced work      environment with changing project priorities. ', 'Experience working with primary human clinical trial samples. ', 'Proven experience as an effective scientist and a team      player with great motivation. ', 'Must have expertise in oncology, cancer cell signaling pathways, biomarker assay development, and translational biology research. ', 'Work      with cross functional leadership to integrate translational support across      oncology pipeline. ', 'Collaborate      with cross functional teams (global working teams) including biology,      translational medicine, and clinical operations etc. ']

job_title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer, Ads Optimization
job_text: ['', 'A degree in Statistics, Machine Learning, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related field', 'Comfortable with distributed learning, big data and large-scale systems', 'A theoretical understanding of ML concepts and techniques. Knowledge of Statistics is a plus.', 'An ML generalist experienced in building ML pipelines. ', 'Requirements', 'Analyze and implement features, and train Machine Learning models on large-scale data.', 'What You’ll Do', 'Responsibilities', ' 1+ years as a Machine Learning Scientist, Machine Learning Engineer, or Data Scientist  An ML generalist experienced in building ML pipelines.  A theoretical understanding of ML concepts and techniques. Knowledge of Statistics is a plus. Software Engineering practices and the ability to write performant production-quality code. Comfortable with distributed learning, big data and large-scale systems A degree in Statistics, Machine Learning, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related field', "How You'll Have Impact", ' Apply Machine Learning / Artificial Intelligence to optimize ad platform efficiency.  Dig into Reddit’s unique product challenges, and go beyond generic out-of-the-box algorithms. Analyze and implement features, and train Machine Learning models on large-scale data. Collaborate across disciplines to find technical solutions to complex challenges. Write production code to ship your model to millions of users. Participate in the full software development cycle: design, develop, QA, deploy, experiment, and analyze. ', 'Write production code to ship your model to millions of users.', 'Collaborate across disciplines to find technical solutions to complex challenges.', 'Apply Machine Learning / Artificial Intelligence to optimize ad platform efficiency. ', '1+ years as a Machine Learning Scientist, Machine Learning Engineer, or Data Scientist ', 'Software Engineering practices and the ability to write performant production-quality code.', 'Dig into Reddit’s unique product challenges, and go beyond generic out-of-the-box algorithms.', 'Participate in the full software development cycle: design, develop, QA, deploy, experiment, and analyze.']

['Must have commercial experience with Python and Docker, and either Sagemaker/Azure/GCP ', 'THE ROLEResponsibilities', 'Extensive experience deploying microservices in a production environment where the past few years have been specifically to put Machine Learning/Deep Learning models into production Must have commercial experience with Python and Docker, and either Sagemaker/Azure/GCP Commercial experience with AWS, Spark, Airflow are preferred\xa0 ', 'You will be using a tech stack of Python, Docker, and AWS in order to maintain a continuous integration/continuous delivery environment ', 'Your Skills And ExperienceIn order to be considered for the Machine Learning Production Engineer position, you are someone with the following background:\xa0 ', 'THE ROLEResponsibilitiesSpecifically, their long-term mission and expansion plan centers around these key responsibilitiesAs the Machine Learning Production Engineer, you will be integral to the overall market impact of the business.\xa0 ', 'The Benefits ', 'PTO and Vacation Days ', 'How To ApplyPlease register your interest by sending your résumé to Elizabeth Sobel via the Apply link on this page.', 'You will be the first hire on the production side with a clear path to a management opportunity\xa0 ', 'How To Apply', 'Machine Learning Production EngineerBoston, MA$140,000-$155,000 + Great Benefits', 'Machine Learning Production EngineerBoston, MA$140,000-$155,000 + Great BenefitsThis labor market expert business is looking to bring on a Machine Learning Production Engineer to their Boston, Massachusetts headquarters in order to support their Data Science team in their end data product line. This is an opportunity for a Production Engineer to join a strong data science team that can hit the ground running doing machine-learning ops. This position calls for someone who is tested and well versed putting microservices into production, and likes working closely with data science functions. This could be a great opportunity for you with massive growth potential. ', '$140,000-$155,000 annual salary Medical, Dental, Vision Benefits 401K PTO and Vacation Days Direct mentorship/training opportunities are offered as desired Autonomy and full product ownership\xa0 ', '401K ', 'Commercial experience with AWS, Spark, Airflow are preferred\xa0 ', 'Medical, Dental, Vision Benefits ', 'Direct mentorship/training opportunities are offered as desired ', 'Autonomy and full product ownership\xa0 ', 'Your Skills And Experience', 'You will be in charge of putting microservices from 3rd party APIs into production ', 'You will be collaborating extremely closely with the data scientists to enable ready to use data for creating algorithms and end data products for clients ', 'Extensive experience deploying microservices in a production environment where the past few years have been specifically to put Machine Learning/Deep Learning models into production ', '$140,000-$155,000 annual salary ', 'You will be collaborating extremely closely with the data scientists to enable ready to use data for creating algorithms and end data products for clients You will be in charge of putting microservices from 3rd party APIs into production You will be using a tech stack of Python, Docker, and AWS in order to maintain a continuous integration/continuous delivery environment You will be the first hire on the production side with a clear path to a management opportunity\xa0 ', 'The Benefits']

['', 'Collaborate with other researchers/research manager on project framing/scoping ', "Develop a strong understanding of home-buyers needs and pain-pointsAbout the team: The UX Research team is part of the organization's Experience Design team that brings together interaction design, visual design, service design, and user research to deliver best-in-class user experiences. Our researchers care deeply about our users, and are continually striving to better ground the company in user-centered thinking. Our team conducts research to understand the end-to-end experiences across multiple platforms including mobile apps, mobile web, and desktop.Who you are: You are able to employ a wide range of research methods. You are able to quickly turn around usability testing and tactical surveys, as well as get deeper qualitative insights through user interviews, diary studies, and field observations. You are able to execute research in an agile development process and juggle multiple deliverables. You think deeply about end-to-end experiences, including both digital and non-digital aspects. Most importantly, you are a passionate advocate for our users throughout the development process.", 'Lead research projects from start to finish: develop screeners and interview guides, moderate, analyze, synthesize, and deliver results ', 'Communicate results and illustrate recommendations in compelling and creative ways', 'Generate insights for both generative and evaluative purposes ', 'Collaborate closely with multi-disciplinary teams ', 'Apply a variety of methodologies and approaches to understand complex problems ', 'Plan and execute research projects that impact products and features used by millions of people every day ', 'Formulate insights for both generative and evaluative purposes ']

job_title: FamilySearch Machine Learning Engineer in Software Dev Engineer 5 (ACE team)
company: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
job_text: ['', 'Education', ' Fluency in at least one non-English language a plus ', '  Creating services to make available machine learning technologies from our Research team.   Applying software development skills, machine learning and data science knowledge to enhance our machine learning and record publication capabilities.   Helping build the future of machine learning tools and services to support the purpose of FamilySearch.   Learning machine learning and data science and it’s application in records production.   As a member of a ML software engineering team, participate in team meetings, team planning sessions, setting team goals, and all other team activities   Estimate the time to develop and deliver features as defined by product management   Participate in peer reviews of project software design and coding   Develop source code and unit tests according to technical designs   Self-directed and can provide classroom instruction in the areas of Church software development processes, industry best practices, and new technologies being adopted for the organization   Provide training, mentoring, or pair programming with other less experienced engineers ', ' 8 years software development experience including Java back end development ', ' Develop source code and unit tests according to technical designs ', ' Solid understanding of applied mathematics, statistics, and probability ', '  Experience collaborating across multiple teams to provide working solutions   Experience leading both technical and non-technical staff   Excellent communication skills   Comfortability working with academic researchers and engineers alike ', ' Passion for Family History ', ' Solid understanding of theory and mechanics of deep learning techniques including: ', ' Large scale data collection, annotation, and verification ', 'Domain Knowledge', ' Basic web development skills ', ' Experience architecting both synchronous and asynchronous systems in an SOA environment ', ' Helping build the future of machine learning tools and services to support the purpose of FamilySearch. Experience with training and testing models in a production environment. Experience with training and testing models in a production environment. ', ' Applying software development skills, machine learning and data science knowledge to enhance our machine learning and record publication capabilities. ['', 'The postdoctoral position is a research position in an industrial setting with the opportunity to collaborate across multiple disciplines that is afforded by a large biopharmaceutical company such as our genomics, analytical and process development groups. You will be encouraged to present and publish your findings.', 'The areas available for research include improved cell line expression and screens, reduced development time, and understanding the performance capabilities of our base CHO cell substrate.', 'Present and publish data at internal and public forums', 'The appointment is for two years providing appropriate progress occurs in the first year. The fellow will design and lead the scientific strategy.', 'Additional responsibilities as assigned.', 'Title:', 'Requirements', ' The postdoctoral position is a research position in an industrial setting with the opportunity to collaborate across multiple disciplines that is afforded by a large biopharmaceutical company such as our genomics, analytical and process development groups. You will be encouraged to present and publish your findings. With a commitment to continuous improvement, a Postdoctoral position in the Molecular Biology and Analytics is open to work on understanding and developing new technology for commercial cell line development (CLD). The areas available for research include improved cell line expression and screens, reduced development time, and understanding the performance capabilities of our base CHO cell substrate. The appointment is for two years providing appropriate progress occurs in the first year. The fellow will design and lead the scientific strategy. Interested candidates who will have their PhD before the start of this postdoctoral fellowship should submit a research proposal related to this opportunity that is a maximum of 2 pages, clarity and brevity are prized, along with their resume. It is anticipated a strong molecular and/or cellular background is needed for success although other backgrounds will be considered depending on your research proposal. Maintain and work in a safe environment. Develop, lead and carry out research strategy to improve CLD technology or its understanding. Work collaboratively within Bristol-Myers Squibb Company and with external parties. Present and publish data at internal and public forums Maintain proper documentation of all research Additional responsibilities as assigned. We also make the services and systems our 1.2 million employees need to do their jobs in our stores and throughout our entire supply chain.At Walmart, our customers and associates are at the center of all our efforts, and design research is one way we observe and listen to our users to make sure we are designing the best experience for their needs. It is not designed to contain or be interpreted as a comprehensive inventory of all duties, responsibilities and qualifications required of employees assigned to this job. The full Job Description can be made available as part of the hiring process.Perks And BenefitsBeyond competitive pay, you can receive incentive awards for your performance. Other great perks include 401(k) match, stock purchase plan, paid maternity and parental leave, PTO, multiple health plans, and much more.Who We AreJoin Walmart and your work could help over 275 million global customers live better every week. Yes, we are the Fortune #1 company. But you’ll quickly find we’re a company who wants you to feel comfortable bringing your whole self to work. A career at Walmart is where the world’s most complex challenges meet a kinder way of life. Our mission spreads far beyond the walls of our stores. Join us and you'll discover why we are a world leader in diversity and inclusion, sustainability, and community involvement. From day one, you’ll be empowered and equipped to do the best work of your life.Equal Opportunity EmployerWalmart, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer – By Choice. We believe we are best equipped to help our associates, customers and the communities we serve live better when we really know them. The challenge framework is managed by Matt Ford’s Product Challenge organization. Visibility: provide a set of dashboard and reports to customers, partner and our support team to allow them to visualize and analyze the fraud activity detected by the product Serviceability: provide customers the ability tune the detection and response strategy based on the risk score. Also provide customers the ability to craft custom logic to meet their own requirements. The product platform consists of technical product managers and the product research team. The product research team is responsible for coming up with different ways to process data collected on a session in order to differentiate bot from human traffic but also detect human fraud within the human traffic. ['Our work is guided by a dedication to safety – in both what we research and how we perform our research our goal is to benefit society. As a subsidiary of Toyota, TRI is fueled by a diverse and inclusive community of people who carry invaluable leadership, experience, and ideas from industry-leading companies. Over half of our technical team carries PhD degrees. We’re continually searching for the world’s best talent ‒ people who are ready to define the new world of mobility with us! ', 'A strong track record in inventing and deploying innovative autonomous behaviors for robotic systems in real-world environments ', 'Expertise and experience in areas such as reactive control, trajectory optimization, coordinated whole-body control, dexterous manipulation, arm motion planning, grasp planning, navigation, and human interaction ', 'Invent and deploy innovative solutions at the intersection of machine learning, mobility, manipulation, human interaction, and simulation for performing useful, human-level tasks, in and around homes ', 'Invent novel ways to engineer and learn robust, real-world behaviors, including using optimization, planning, reactive control, self-supervision, active learning, learning from demonstration, simulation and transfer learning, and real-world adaptation ', 'The team will be focused on heavily leveraging machine learning to marry perception, prediction, and action to produce robust, reactive, coordinated robot behaviors, bootstrapping from simulation, leveraging large amounts of data, and adapting in real-world scenarios. ', 'Responsibilities:', 'We strive to build a company that helps our people thrive, achieve work-life balance, and bring their best selves to work. At TRI, you will have the opportunity to enjoy the best of both worlds ‒ a fun environment with forward-thinking people who enjoy solving tough problems and the financial backing to successfully achieve our goals. Come work with TRI if you’re interested in transforming mobility through designing technology for safer cars, enabling the elderly to age in place, or designing alternative fuel sources. Start your impossible with us. ', '- Bring advanced mobility technology to market faster. ', 'Be part of a team that fields systems, performs failure analysis, and iterates on improving performance and capabilities ', 'TRI is assembling a world-class team to develop and integrate innovative solutions that enable a robot to perform complex, human-level mobile manipulation tasks, navigate with and among people, and learn and adapt over time. \xa0The team will develop, deploy, and validate systems in real-world environments, in and around homes. ', '- Discover new materials that will make batteries and hydrogen fuel cells smaller, lighter, less expensive and more powerful. ', 'Qualifications: ', 'Expertise and experience in applying machine learning to robotics, including areas such as reinforcement, imitation, and transfer learning ', '- Develop technology for vehicles and robots to help people enjoy new levels of independence, access, and mobility. ', 'Strong software engineering skills, preferably in C++, and analysis and debugging of autonomous robotic systems ', 'At Toyota Research Institute (TRI), we’re working to build a future where everyone has the freedom to move, engage, and explore with a focus on reducing vehicle collisions, injuries, and fatalities. Join us in our mission to improve the quality of human life through advances in artificial intelligence, automated driving, robotics, and materials science. We’re dedicated to building a world of “mobility for all” where everyone, regardless of age or ability, can live in harmony with technology to enjoy a better life. Through innovations in AI, we’ll help… ', 'M.S. or Ph.D. in an engineering-related field ', 'Passionate about seeing robotics have a real-world, large-scale impact', 'Responsibilities: ', ' ', 'Follow software practices that produce maintainable code, including automated testing, continuous integration, code style conformity, and code review ', '- Develop vehicles incapable of causing a crash, regardless of the actions of the driver. ', 'A team player with strong communication skills, and a willingness to learn from others and contribute back to the robotics community with publications or open source code ', 'Develop, integrate, and deploy algorithms linking perception to autonomous robot actions, including manipulation, navigation, and human-robot interaction Invent and deploy innovative solutions at the intersection of machine learning, mobility, manipulation, human interaction, and simulation for performing useful, human-level tasks, in and around homes Invent novel ways to engineer and learn robust, real-world behaviors, including using optimization, planning, reactive control, self-supervision, active learning, learning from demonstration, simulation and transfer learning, and real-world adaptation Be part of a team that fields systems, performs failure analysis, and iterates on improving performance and capabilities Follow software practices that produce maintainable code, including automated testing, continuous integration, code style conformity, and code review ', 'M.S. or Ph.D. in an engineering-related field A strong track record in inventing and deploying innovative autonomous behaviors for robotic systems in real-world environments Expertise and experience in areas such as reactive control, trajectory optimization, coordinated whole-body control, dexterous manipulation, arm motion planning, grasp planning, navigation, and human interaction Expertise and experience in applying machine learning to robotics, including areas such as reinforcement, imitation, and transfer learning Strong software engineering skills, preferably in C++, and analysis and debugging of autonomous robotic systems A team player with strong communication skills, and a willingness to learn from others and contribute back to the robotics community with publications or open source code Passionate about seeing robotics have a real-world, large-scale impact', "TRI has the runway, roadmap, and expertise to transition the technology development to a product that impacts the lives of millions of people. \xa0Apply to join a fast-moving team that demands high-risk innovation and learning from failures, using rigorous processes to identify key technologies, develop a robust, high-quality system, and quantitatively evaluate performance. \xa0As part of the team, you will be surrounded and supported by the significant core ML, cloud, software, and hardware expertise at TRI, and be a part of TRI's positive and diverse culture. ", '- Develop human-centered AI systems to augment (not replace) human decision making to increase the quality of decisions (e.g. mitigate cognitive biases) and/or to facilitate faster innovation cycles. ', 'Qualifications:', 'Develop, integrate, and deploy algorithms linking perception to autonomous robot actions, including manipulation, navigation, and human-robot interaction ']

job_title: Senior Data Engineer, Cohort Creation API
job_text: ['', 'Managed technical dependencies between different microservices to ensure smooth operations\xa0', 'Significant experience designing APIs for use in web application development (synchronous vs asynchronous response patterns, caching strategies, etc)', 'Set a high technical standard overall and be a mentoring resource for others on the team and in the larger organization', 'Recommended and implemented additional pre-calculation and caching strategies as needed to ensure that SLAs are met', 'Significant experience optimizing data retrieval processes supporting API output, as above, ideally within a low query volume / high data volume environment', 'Leveraged relevant AWS services (API gateway, lambdas, among others), updating as needed to take advantage of new beneficial features in support of the API', 'Partnered with product managers to understand the variety of internal and external cohort specification needs across a diverse set of use cases', 'Our people are the center of our success. We are a smart, supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing what’s broken in healthcare. It’s fun, challenging and important. Join us!', 'At Komodo Health, we don’t just accept differences — we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products, and our community. Komodo Health is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace.', 'At Komodo Health, our mission is to reduce the global burden of disease. Smarter use of data is essential to this mission. We combine the world’s most comprehensive view of patient encounters with innovative algorithms and decades of clinical expertise to power our Healthcare Map, the industry’s most precise view of the U.S. healthcare system. With the Healthcare Map as our foundation, we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industry.', 'Significant experience designing APIs for use in web application development (synchronous vs asynchronous response patterns, caching strategies, etc)Significant experience optimizing data retrieval processes supporting API output, as above, ideally within a low query volume / high data volume environmentDemonstrably deep experience with PythonDemonstrably deep experience with relevant ‘big data’ processing either via Spark or through a modern MPP database like Snowflake, ideally with experience in bothExperience with separate caching/cache invalidation strategies\xa0Understand and design for non-functional concerns such as performance, cost optimization, maintainability and developer experienceStrong communication with engineers, product managers, and salespeople', 'The Opportunity at Komodo Health', 'Experience with separate caching/cache invalidation strategies\xa0', 'Demonstrably deep experience with Python', 'Generation of a medically-related cohort is the gateway to all the work we do at Komodo Health. As a member of the team responsible for Komodo’s standardized approach to healthcare cohort generation (Prism), you are responsible for the backbone data retrieval and transformations required by our internal service layer used to serve cohort generation along a variety of axes - patients, payers, providers, etc. You are responsible for ensuring that complex cohort generation queries are supported through the cohort generation API, adhere to SLAs, and for the underlying caching necessary to support multiple cohort generation access patterns.', 'Understand and design for non-functional concerns such as performance, cost optimization, maintainability and developer experience', 'We Breathe Life Into Data', 'Expanded or enhanced the Prism internal data model to ensure timely performance for all types of cohort generation requestsRecommended and implemented additional pre-calculation and caching strategies as needed to ensure that SLAs are metPromoted API versioning best practices and open API standards in developmentLeveraged relevant AWS services (API gateway, lambdas, among others), updating as needed to take advantage of new beneficial features in support of the APIPartnered with product managers to understand the variety of internal and external cohort specification needs across a diverse set of use casesEnsured non-functional requirements are met, such as around developer experience and maintainability\xa0Managed technical dependencies between different microservices to ensure smooth operations\xa0Set a high technical standard overall and be a mentoring resource for others on the team and in the larger organization', 'Ensured non-functional requirements are met, such as around developer experience and maintainability\xa0', 'Expanded or enhanced the Prism internal data model to ensure timely performance for all types of cohort generation requests', 'Demonstrably deep experience with relevant ‘big data’ processing either via Spark or through a modern MPP database like Snowflake, ideally with experience in both', 'Strong communication with engineers, product managers, and salespeople', 'Looking back on your first 12 months at Komodo Health, you will have…', 'Promoted API versioning best practices and open API standards in development', 'What you bring to Komodo:']

['', 'Knowledge, Experience, And Skills', 'For Current Gilead Employees And Contractors', 'Conduct high-quality image-based data analysis and generate detailed reports to support internal decision making.Evaluate and implement new computational approaches in digital pathology to support understanding of histopathological endpoints.Ensure integrity and deadline-driven timely completion of analysis workflows, data package generation, and report submission.', 'Essential Duties And Job Functions', 'Experience with whole-slide imaging in support of histopathology data collection and analysis is preferred.', 'Evaluate and implement new computational approaches in digital pathology to support understanding of histopathological endpoints.', 'Familiarity with cell biology and microscopy is a plus.', 'Programming skills and experience with one or more of MATLAB, CellProfiler, Fiji, OME, OpenCV, Aperio, HALO, QuPath or Visiopharm is highly desirable. ', 'Ensure integrity and deadline-driven timely completion of analysis workflows, data package generation, and report submission.', 'Experience in deep learning and convolutional neural networks and its applications to image processing and computer vision is a plus.', 'Conduct high-quality image-based data analysis and generate detailed reports to support internal decision making.', 'For Jobs In The United States', 'Job Description', 'BS or MS with several years of experience or PhD with extensive background in biological science/engineering or in a field related to signal/image processing, pattern recognition, and/or computer vision.', 'Experience in manipulating and analyzing large internal, public and commercial datasets and with visualization is a plus.', 'Specific expertise in predictive modeling using statistical and machine learning methods is a plus.', 'BS or MS with several years of experience or PhD with extensive background in biological science/engineering or in a field related to signal/image processing, pattern recognition, and/or computer vision.Programming skills and experience with one or more of MATLAB, CellProfiler, Fiji, OME, OpenCV, Aperio, HALO, QuPath or Visiopharm is highly desirable. Experience with whole-slide imaging in support of histopathology data collection and analysis is preferred.Specific expertise in predictive modeling using statistical and machine learning methods is a plus.Experience in manipulating and analyzing large internal, public and commercial datasets and with visualization is a plus.Experience in deep learning and convolutional neural networks and its applications to image processing and computer vision is a plus.Familiarity with cell biology and microscopy is a plus.']

['', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'You creatively answer questions, Take us through a story about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation.', 'You have broadened mastery over several user research methods', 'You Can Really Knock Our Socks Off If', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'Facilitate and participate in workshops, make sure teams ideate with a user empathy in mind.', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. Nurture our backlog of learning opportunities. And, own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Hire and collaborate with hand-picked freelance researchers. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Facilitate and participate in workshops, make sure teams ideate with a user empathy in mind. Translate customer insights into meaningful recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis workshops ', 'You can communicate the lessons you learned from failed projects. It happens to all of us! We want to know what you learned?', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'You can draw broad connections and use your insights to influence executives and increase user empathy', "You're able to speak to design principles and language principles fluently", 'Translate customer insights into meaningful recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You can dig into thick data and find gold! You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', "You'll Catch Our Eye If", 'Nurture our backlog of learning opportunities. And, own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', ' You have broadened mastery over several user research methods You can demonstrate how you set the bar for engaging with peers and other disciplines, building positive relationships with executives You can show us how you communicated sophisticated concepts and gain traction on hard to tackle problems. You\'re able to speak to design principles and language principles fluently You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You can draw broad connections and use your insights to influence executives and increase user empathy You work effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. ', 'You work effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You creatively answer questions, Take us through a story about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation. You can communicate the lessons you learned from failed projects. It happens to all of us! We want to know what you learned? You are comfortable facilitating participatory thinking workshops. You can dig into thick data and find gold! You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. ', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', 'You are comfortable facilitating participatory thinking workshops.', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Hire and collaborate with hand-picked freelance researchers.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis workshops', 'You can show us how you communicated sophisticated concepts and gain traction on hard to tackle problems.', 'You can demonstrate how you set the bar for engaging with peers and other disciplines, building positive relationships with executives']

['Our work is guided by a dedication to safety – in both what we research and how we perform our research our goal is to benefit society. As a subsidiary of Toyota, TRI is fueled by a diverse and inclusive community of people who carry invaluable leadership, experience, and ideas from industry-leading companies. Over half of our technical team carries PhD degrees. We’re continually searching for the world’s best talent ‒ people who are ready to define the new world of mobility with us! ', 'Invent novel ways to create, label, and use large, possibly distributed datasets, using self-supervision, active learning, simulation, and real-world adaptation ', 'We strive to build a company that helps our people thrive, achieve work-life balance, and bring their best selves to work. At TRI, you will have the opportunity to enjoy the best of both worlds ‒ a fun environment with forward-thinking people who enjoy solving tough problems and the financial backing to successfully achieve our goals. Come work with TRI if you’re interested in transforming mobility through designing technology for safer cars, enabling the elderly to age in place, or designing alternative fuel sources. Start your impossible with us. ', 'Strong software engineering skills, preferably in C++, and analysis and debugging of robotic perception algorithms ', '- Bring advanced mobility technology to market faster. ', 'Invent and deploy innovative solutions at the intersection of machine learning, computer vision, multi-sensor perception, and simulation for understanding human environments and humans, in and around homes ', 'Be part of a team that fields systems, performs failure analysis, and iterates on improving performance and capabilities ', 'TRI is assembling a world-class team to develop and integrate innovative solutions that enable a robot to perform complex, human-level mobile manipulation tasks, navigate with and among people, and learn and adapt over time. \xa0The team will develop, deploy, and validate systems in real-world environments, in and around homes. ', '- Discover new materials that will make batteries and hydrogen fuel cells smaller, lighter, less expensive and more powerful. ', 'Responsibilities', "TRI has the runway, roadmap, and expertise to transition the technology development to a product that impacts the lives of millions of people. \xa0Apply to join a fast moving team that demands high-risk innovation and learning from failures, using rigorous processes to identify key technologies, develop a robust, high quality system, and quantitatively evaluate performance. \xa0As part of the team, you will be surrounded and supported by the significant core ML, cloud, software, and hardware expertise at TRI, and be a part of TRI's positive and diverse culture. ", 'The team will be focused on heavily leveraging machine learning to marry perception, prediction, and action to produce robust, reactive, coordinated robot behaviors, bootstrapping from simulation, leveraging large amounts of data, and adapting in real world scenarios. ', 'Expertise and experience in applying deep learning to perception problems ', '- Develop technology for vehicles and robots to help people enjoy new levels of independence, access, and mobility. ', 'At Toyota Research Institute (TRI), we’re working to build a future where everyone has the freedom to move, engage, and explore with a focus on reducing vehicle collisions, injuries, and fatalities. Join us in our mission to improve the quality of human life through advances in artificial intelligence, automated driving, robotics, and materials science. We’re dedicated to building a world of “mobility for all” where everyone, regardless of age or ability, can live in harmony with technology to enjoy a better life. Through innovations in AI, we’ll help… ', 'Develop, integrate, and deploy algorithms linking perception to autonomous robot actions, including manipulation, navigation, and human-robot interaction Invent and deploy innovative solutions at the intersection of machine learning, computer vision, multi-sensor perception, and simulation for understanding human environments and humans, in and around homes Invent novel ways to create, label, and use large, possibly distributed datasets, using self-supervision, active learning, simulation, and real-world adaptation Be part of a team that fields systems, performs failure analysis, and iterates on improving performance and capabilities Follow software practices that produce maintainable code, including automated testing, continuous integration, code style conformity, and code review ', 'Passionate about seeing robotics have a real-world, large-scale impact', ' ', 'Follow software practices that produce maintainable code, including automated testing, continuous integration, code style conformity, and code review ', 'M.S. or Ph.D. in an engineering related field ', '- Develop vehicles incapable of causing a crash, regardless of the actions of the driver. ', 'Qualifications ', 'M.S. or Ph.D. in an engineering related field A strong track record in inventing and deploying innovative perception algorithms to robotic systems in real-world environments Expertise and experience in areas such as object detection, classification, segmentation, and tracking, sensor fusion, state estimation, local 3d mapping and reconstruction, person detection, and human pose estimation Expertise and experience in applying deep learning to perception problems Strong software engineering skills, preferably in C++, and analysis and debugging of robotic perception algorithms A team player with strong communication skills, and a willingness to learn from others and contribute back to the robotics community with publications or open source code Passionate about seeing robotics have a real-world, large-scale impact', 'Expertise and experience in areas such as object detection, classification, segmentation, and tracking, sensor fusion, state estimation, local 3d mapping and reconstruction, person detection, and human pose estimation ', 'A team player with strong communication skills, and a willingness to learn from others and contribute back to the robotics community with publications or open source code ', 'Qualifications', '- Develop human-centered AI systems to augment (not replace) human decision making to increase the quality of decisions (e.g. mitigate cognitive biases) and/or to facilitate faster innovation cycles. ', 'Responsibilities ', 'A strong track record in inventing and deploying innovative perception algorithms to robotic systems in real-world environments ', 'Develop, integrate, and deploy algorithms linking perception to autonomous robot actions, including manipulation, navigation, and human-robot interaction ']

['', 'General Requirement', 'AWS\xa0', 'Experience with Segment or another CDP - Familiarity with Node - Machine learning - Data visualization, web and/or mobile (eg, D3.js) - Spark, Hadoop, or Hive', 'Our Fintech Startup is democratizing access to institutional quality investing resources. We are bringing innovation to an industry that typically has had very little. The environment is super collaborative, with multiple working sessions each week across engineering, product, and design. While we are building in a serious industry, we are a fun group and always eager to make sure everyone has a real impact on what we are creating together. Our Fintech Startup is building a modern financial research platform and network. Our aim is to be the center for retail investors to interact about public markets. From working with and helping visualize large amounts of real-time data to creating a delightful user experience for investors, you will have the opportunity to be a generalist or specialist based on your interest and rapidly become a key part of a small, but powerful and very fast-moving New York based team.', 'You will manage and further build out our data infrastructure pipelines and data visualizations.\xa0', 'The work will support core business decisions and models that serve as the basis for core product and growth strategy.', 'Python\xa0', 'SQL (Postgres)Python\xa0Redis\xa0AWS\xa0Periscope or Looker', 'One of our client is looking to hire a "Data Engineer" in Ithaca, New York. job_title: Senior Data Engineer, Cohort Creation API
job_text: ['', 'Managed technical dependencies between different microservices to ensure smooth operations\xa0', 'Significant experience designing APIs for use in web application development (synchronous vs asynchronous response patterns, caching strategies, etc)', 'Set a high technical standard overall and be a mentoring resource for others on the team and in the larger organization', 'Recommended and implemented additional pre-calculation and caching strategies as needed to ensure that SLAs are met', 'Significant experience optimizing data retrieval processes supporting API output, as above, ideally within a low query volume / high data volume environment', 'Leveraged relevant AWS services (API gateway, lambdas, among others), updating as needed to take advantage of new beneficial features in support of the API', 'Partnered with product managers to understand the variety of internal and external cohort specification needs across a diverse set of use cases', 'Our people are the center of our success. We are a smart, supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing what’s broken in healthcare. It’s fun, challenging and important. Join us!', 'At Komodo Health, we don’t just accept differences — we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products, and our community. Komodo Health is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace.', 'At Komodo Health, our mission is to reduce the global burden of disease. Smarter use of data is essential to this mission. We combine the world’s most comprehensive view of patient encounters with innovative algorithms and decades of clinical expertise to power our Healthcare Map, the industry’s most precise view of the U.S. healthcare system. With the Healthcare Map as our foundation, we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industry.', 'Significant experience designing APIs for use in web application development (synchronous vs asynchronous response patterns, caching strategies, etc)Significant experience optimizing data retrieval processes supporting API output, as above, ideally within a low query volume / high data volume environmentDemonstrably deep experience with PythonDemonstrably deep experience with relevant ‘big data’ processing either via Spark or through a modern MPP database like Snowflake, ideally with experience in bothExperience with separate caching/cache invalidation strategies\xa0Understand and design for non-functional concerns such as performance, cost optimization, maintainability and developer experienceStrong communication with engineers, product managers, and salespeople', 'The Opportunity at Komodo Health', 'Experience with separate caching/cache invalidation strategies\xa0', 'Demonstrably deep experience with Python', 'Generation of a medically-related cohort is the gateway to all the work we do at Komodo Health. As a member of the team responsible for Komodo’s standardized approach to healthcare cohort generation (Prism), you are responsible for the backbone data retrieval and transformations required by our internal service layer used to serve cohort generation along a variety of axes - patients, payers, providers, etc. You are responsible for ensuring that complex cohort generation queries are supported through the cohort generation API, adhere to SLAs, and for the underlying caching necessary to support multiple cohort generation access patterns.', 'Understand and design for non-functional concerns such as performance, cost optimization, maintainability and developer experience', 'We Breathe Life Into Data', 'Expanded or enhanced the Prism internal data model to ensure timely performance for all types of cohort generation requestsRecommended and implemented additional pre-calculation and caching strategies as needed to ensure that SLAs are metPromoted API versioning best practices and open API standards in developmentLeveraged relevant AWS services (API gateway, lambdas, among others), updating as needed to take advantage of new beneficial features in support of the APIPartnered with product managers to understand the variety of internal and external cohort specification needs across a diverse set of use casesEnsured non-functional requirements are met, such as around developer experience and maintainability\xa0Managed technical dependencies between different microservices to ensure smooth operations\xa0Set a high technical standard overall and be a mentoring resource for others on the team and in the larger organization', 'Ensured non-functional requirements are met, such as around developer experience and maintainability\xa0', 'Expanded or enhanced the Prism internal data model to ensure timely performance for all types of cohort generation requests', 'Demonstrably deep experience with relevant ‘big data’ processing either via Spark or through a modern MPP database like Snowflake, ideally with experience in both', 'Strong communication with engineers, product managers, and salespeople', 'Looking back on your first 12 months at Komodo Health, you will have…', 'Promoted API versioning best practices and open API standards in development', 'What you bring to Komodo:']

['', 'Molecular Diagnostics Company in Stealth Mode', 'We are looking for a Junior Scientist Contractor who will support the laboratory development, experimentation, and management of innovative multi-omic assays for novel applications in Oncology. Flexible hours, including evenings and weekends available.', '\xa0', 'Who We Are', 'The Company’s founding team and advisors include more than a dozen former senior executives from Illumina, Sequenom, PGDx, LabCorp, Pathway Genomics, J&J, and more. Most of them hold MD, PhD, MS, DVM, or MBA degrees, and have been affiliated with prestigious academic institutions including Cornell, Harvard, Johns Hopkins, MIT, Stanford, UCSF, UCLA, University of Michigan, UC Berkeley, UCSD, University of Oxford, University of Cambridge, Yale and Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Practical knowledge of LIMS/database query tools is preferred.', 'Job Description', 'Our Organization', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with handling blood plasma samples and cell-free nucleic acids is preferred', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience of molecular biology techniques, including general nucleic acid extraction (DNA/RNA), sample QC on Tapestation, Bioanalyzer or Qubit is preferred.', 'At our Company, you will help execute SOPs, and laboratory workflows used to analyze samples, including isolation of nucleic acids (DNA/RNA) from banked biospecimens and QC. You will handle biospecimens in a molecular diagnostic setting with separate areas of pre-PCR and post-PCR procedures rooms. You will support sample accessioning, processing and storage workflow. You may operate high-throughput liquid handler to handle large cohorts of samples. You may be working during evenings and weekends to help the team reach overall product development timeline. You will perform quality control and quality assurance procedures, and tracking and managing data within our LIMS and Confluence systems. You will operate under the direction of the Head of Assay Development. This role requires meticulous recordkeeping, excellent attention to detail, and the ability to multi-task and be flexible with assignments and schedules.', 'What you bring:', 'Key Duties and Responsibilities', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiar with the operation of DNA handling tools such as pipettes, PCR machines, temperature-controlled heatblocks and basic lab equipment. ', 'Location', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BS (or equivalent industry experience) in molecular biology, biochemistry, genetics, chemistry, or a closely related field.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent time management, project management, multitasking and organizational skills.', 'The position is based in San Diego.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Basic experience of working in a molecular biology laboratory.', '>15 Employees & Founded in 2019 / Delaware Incorporated, Based in La Jolla, CA', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understanding of basic molecular biology concept such as basis of the human genome, cancer genomics, cancer biology and cell biology. ', 'The Company is a venture-backed San Diego based genomics/molecular diagnostics startup focused on the development of breakthrough non-invasive liquid biopsy tests for the early detection, characterization, and management of cancer in a hitherto unexplored and novel area with tremendous commercial and scientific potential. We have a highly innovative approach to the science, with cutting-edge assays that are customized for the target genome and innovative next-generation sequencing (NGS) based techniques. We aim to revolutionize the detection and ultimately treatment of cancer for this vast target population.']

job_title: Senior Data Engineer, Life Science Products
job_text: ['', 'Evaluated new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.', 'This is an opportunity to help solve complex challenges, and be a part of a team of folks accomplished in diverse Engineering disciplines; focused on using the best of what lies at the forefront of technology and skills to address complex, real-world problems in the Healthcare and Life Science space. Some of the tools we use are: Spark, Snowflake, Airflow, Python, Amazon AWS EMR, AWS Lambda, Kubernetes, and Docker.', 'Collaborated closely with the Product and Program Management team to build out new data features.', 'Our people are the center of our success. We are a smart, supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing what’s broken in healthcare. It’s fun, challenging and important. Join us!', 'At Komodo Health, we don’t just accept differences — we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products, and our community. Komodo Health is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace.', 'Analyzed, reviewed and translated product management artifacts like product requirements documents and product roadmaps, into actionable engineering requirements documents.', 'At Komodo Health, our mission is to reduce the global burden of disease. Smarter use of data is essential to this mission. We combine the world’s most comprehensive view of patient encounters with innovative algorithms and decades of clinical expertise to power our Healthcare Map, the industry’s most precise view of the U.S. healthcare system. With the Healthcare Map as our foundation, we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industry.', 'Pipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or Luigi', 'The Opportunity at Komodo Health', 'The Life Sciences Product team is looking for a Senior Data Engineer to help us build next generation data pipelines, data infrastructure and databases, and to develop data processing that is scalable, reliable and automated. The ideal candidate has demonstrated experience going from understanding business use cases and whiteboard designs all the way through to the nuances of implementation and rollout. The ideal candidate would have experience with product development and has gone through different phases of product growth and maturity.', 'We Breathe Life Into Data', 'Experience with...', 'Data processing platforms such as Spark, Amazon EMR, Google DataProc, Hadoop/MapReduce, etc.', 'Created automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate our data infrastructure and our data pipelines.', "Building and deploying large-scale, complex data processing pipelines.Python or Scala development, proficiency with at least one of them is requiredPipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or LuigiData processing platforms such as Spark, Amazon EMR, Google DataProc, Hadoop/MapReduce, etc.Data warehouse, modeling, and SQL experience such as Snowflake, Redshift, or BigQueryYou've led planning, launching, optimizing, and refactoring phases of data pipeline platforms.Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.", 'Collaborated with Data Scientists to implement descriptive, forecasting, and predictive algorithms and models using latest technologies.', 'Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.', 'Data warehouse, modeling, and SQL experience such as Snowflake, Redshift, or BigQuery', 'Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.', "You've led planning, launching, optimizing, and refactoring phases of data pipeline platforms.", 'Python or Scala development, proficiency with at least one of them is required', 'Looking back on your first 12 months at Komodo Health, you will have…', 'Designed, developed, and implemented data infrastructure, data pipelines and data processing code for product features.Analyzed, reviewed and translated product management artifacts like product requirements documents and product roadmaps, into actionable engineering requirements documents.Created automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate our data infrastructure and our data pipelines.Evaluated new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.Collaborated closely with the Product and Program Management team to build out new data features.Collaborated with Data Scientists to implement descriptive, forecasting, and predictive algorithms and models using latest technologies.', 'What you bring to Komodo:', 'Building and deploying large-scale, complex data processing pipelines.', 'Designed, developed, and implemented data infrastructure, data pipelines and data processing code for product features.']

job_title: Senior Associate Scientist Hematology, Biotherapeutics Research
job_text: ['', ' In vitro cell culture, including work with primary cell culture.', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Role Description', 'Eligible for Employee Referral Bonus', ' Self-motivation and the ability to work independently, as well collaborate as part of internal and external cross-functional teams.', ' Required expertise in vitro assays, in vitro cell based assays, ELISA, QRTPCR, FACS, molecular and cell biology (transfection, SDS-PAGE, Western blot analysis, immunoprecipitation).', ' Develop and perform wide range of hematological in vitro and cell-based assays.', ' Excellent skills in the development, implementation, and execution of in vitro assays.', 'Sunshine Act', ' Execute on in vitro assays, in vitro cell based assays, ELISA, QRTPCR, FACS, molecular and cell biology (transfection, SDS-PAGE, Western blot analysis, immunoprecipitation) and hemostasis assays.', 'Responsibilities', ' Excellent organizational, interpersonal, written, and verbal communication skills.', 'Role Responsibilities', ' Experience in laboratory research required with strong skills in basic molecular biology and in vitro assays: ELISA, SDS-PAGE, Western blot analysis, immunoprecipitation and cell culture).', 'Other Job Details:', ' Collaborate with cross-functional teams both internally and externally.', ' Demonstrated ability to drive for results and generate innovative solutions with minimum supervision.', ' Bachelor’s degree with > 2 years of experience in a Biomedical Research (Biotechnology, Chemistry/Biochemistry, Chemical/Biochemical Engineering, or equivalent)', ' Generate and interpret data for presentation at project meetings', ' Strong in vitro cell culture skills, including work with primary cell culture.', 'EEO & Employment Eligibility']

job_title: Senior Machine Learning / Reinforcement Learning Researcher, Machine Assisted Cognition
job_text: ['Our work is guided by a dedication to safety – in both what we research and how we perform our research our goal is to benefit society. As a subsidiary of Toyota, TRI is fueled by a diverse and inclusive community of people who carry invaluable leadership, experience, and ideas from industry-leading companies. Over half of our technical team carries PhD degrees. We’re continually searching for the world’s best talent ‒ people who are ready to define the new world of mobility with us! ', 'Scaling up to more sophisticated cognitive tasks and larger groups while countering the tendency of groups to be risk-averse. ', 'Growing quality of predictions, judgments, and decisions by (a) reducing/neutralizing cognitive biases, (b) ensuring fitness, (c) ensuring ethics ', 'Experience architecting and deploying machine learning systems in an industry setting. ', 'TRI’s Machine Assisted Cognition team is developing AI systems to augment (not replace) human decision making. In particular, we are interested in advancing the intersection between machine learning, causal inference, and behavioral science to increase the quality of human decisions and/or to facilitate faster innovation cycles. We are looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer / Reinforcement Learning Researcher to join this exciting new endeavor to collaborate cross-functionally with machine learning and causal inference experts, behavioral scientists, designers, and user researchers. ', 'Pushing the boundaries of AIs that can reason (causally informed AI) ', 'Responsibilities:', 'We strive to build a company that helps our people thrive, achieve work-life balance, and bring their best selves to work. At TRI, you will have the opportunity to enjoy the best of both worlds ‒ a fun environment with forward-thinking people who enjoy solving tough problems and the financial backing to successfully achieve our goals. Come work with TRI if you’re interested in transforming mobility through designing technology for safer cars, enabling the elderly to age in place, or designing alternative fuel sources. Start your impossible with us. ', 'Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in a quantitative field (e.g. Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Engineering, Chemistry). Ph.D. preferred. ', '- Bring advanced mobility technology to market faster. ', 'Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in a quantitative field (e.g. Computer Science, Mathematics, Physics, Engineering, Chemistry). Ph.D. preferred. Deep expertise in machine learning and deep learning. Proficiency in causal inference and advanced statistics. Experience architecting and deploying machine learning systems in an industry setting. Experience in providing technical leadership and mentorship. Strong track record of driving and executing sophisticated, open-ended, cross-functional projects. Strong interpersonal skills. Great teammate. Appetite to learn across functions.', 'Investigate and research how RL and ML practice influence human decision making and outcomes of future choices ', 'Strong interpersonal skills. Great teammate. ', '- Discover new materials that will make batteries and hydrogen fuel cells smaller, lighter, less expensive and more powerful. ', 'Qualifications: ', '- Develop technology for vehicles and robots to help people enjoy new levels of independence, access, and mobility. ', 'Experience in providing technical leadership and mentorship. ', 'At Toyota Research Institute (TRI), we’re working to build a future where everyone has the freedom to move, engage, and explore with a focus on reducing vehicle collisions, injuries, and fatalities. Join us in our mission to improve the quality of human life through advances in artificial intelligence, automated driving, robotics, and materials science. We’re dedicated to building a world of “mobility for all” where everyone, regardless of age or ability, can live in harmony with technology to enjoy a better life. Through innovations in AI, we’ll help… ', 'Appetite to learn across functions.', 'Responsibilities: ', ' ', 'Proficiency in causal inference and advanced statistics. ', 'Investigate and research how RL and ML practice influence human decision making and outcomes of future choices Collaborate cross-functionally with machine learning and causal inference experts, designers, behavioral scientists, user researchers, and university partners to craft and build novel AIs to augment human decision making. Some potential research and development areas may include: Pushing the boundaries of AIs that can reason (causally informed AI) Growing quality of predictions, judgments, and decisions by (a) reducing/neutralizing cognitive biases, (b) ensuring fitness, (c) ensuring ethics Scaling up to more sophisticated cognitive tasks and larger groups while countering the tendency of groups to be risk-averse. Mentor and advise others. ', 'Deep expertise in machine learning and deep learning. ', '- Develop vehicles incapable of causing a crash, regardless of the actions of the driver. ', 'Strong track record of driving and executing sophisticated, open-ended, cross-functional projects. ', 'Collaborate cross-functionally with machine learning and causal inference experts, designers, behavioral scientists, user researchers, and university partners to craft and build novel AIs to augment human decision making. Some potential research and development areas may include: ', 'Mentor and advise others. ', '- Develop human-centered AI systems to augment (not replace) human decision making to increase the quality of decisions (e.g. mitigate cognitive biases) and/or to facilitate faster innovation cycles. ', 'Qualifications:']

job_title: Senior Data Engineer, Life Science Products
job_text: ['', 'Evaluated new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.', 'This is an opportunity to help solve complex challenges, and be a part of a team of folks accomplished in diverse Engineering disciplines; focused on using the best of what lies at the forefront of technology and skills to address complex, real-world problems in the Healthcare and Life Science space. Some of the tools we use are: Spark, Snowflake, Airflow, Python, Amazon AWS EMR, AWS Lambda, Kubernetes, and Docker.', 'Collaborated closely with the Product and Program Management team to build out new data features.', 'Our people are the center of our success. We are a smart, supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing what’s broken in healthcare. It’s fun, challenging and important. Join us!', 'At Komodo Health, we don’t just accept differences — we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products, and our community. With the Healthcare Map as our foundation, we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industry.', 'Pipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or Luigi', 'The Opportunity at Komodo Health', 'The Life Sciences Product team is looking for a Senior Data Engineer to help us build next generation data pipelines, data infrastructure and databases, and to develop data processing that is scalable, reliable and automated. ['', 'Familiarity with parenteral manufacturing requirements, container/closure integrity, and clinical and commercial unit operations.', 'Basic Qualifications', 'The incumbent will assist in the development and scale-up of drug product processes from bench top to pilot scale and, as required, technology transfer to commercial plants. ['', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'You creatively answer questions, Take us through a story about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation.', 'You have broadened mastery over several user research methods', 'You Can Really Knock Our Socks Off If', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'Facilitate and participate in workshops, make sure teams ideate with a user empathy in mind.', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. Nurture our backlog of learning opportunities. And, own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Hire and collaborate with hand-picked freelance researchers. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Facilitate and participate in workshops, make sure teams ideate with a user empathy in mind. Translate customer insights into meaningful recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis workshops ', 'You can communicate the lessons you learned from failed projects. It happens to all of us! We want to know what you learned?', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'You can draw broad connections and use your insights to influence executives and increase user empathy', "You're able to speak to design principles and language principles fluently", 'Translate customer insights into meaningful recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You can dig into thick data and find gold! You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', "You'll Catch Our Eye If", 'Nurture our backlog of learning opportunities. And, own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', ' You have broadened mastery over several user research methods You can demonstrate how you set the bar for engaging with peers and other disciplines, building positive relationships with executives You can show us how you communicated sophisticated concepts and gain traction on hard to tackle problems. You\'re able to speak to design principles and language principles fluently You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You can draw broad connections and use your insights to influence executives and increase user empathy You work effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. ', 'You work effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You creatively answer questions, Take us through a story about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation. You can communicate the lessons you learned from failed projects. It happens to all of us! We want to know what you learned? You are comfortable facilitating participatory thinking workshops. You can dig into thick data and find gold! ', 'You work effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.
