job_title: Data Engineer - Real Pay, Real Equity play!
job_text: ['', 'Email Your Resume In Word To', " BS/BA in Math, physics, stats, Computer Science, etc. (MS or PhD preferred) with 3+ years of dedicated production data engineering experience Must have Python programming experience Experience with either Airflow or Pandas & Django is a must Data expertise - identifying data patterns, troubleshoot data, etc. Experience with PostgresSQL Experience with data mining, machine learning, statistics, deep learning, NLP, etc are a plus Machine learning framework experience i.e.: sklearn, keras, nltk & the underlying algo's for NLP & Deep Learning are all helpful SQL experience is good Data visualization would be great Some experience with tech such as Docker, Kubernetes, Django would be great Kaggle competition experience gives you a leg up Startup experience & mentality", ' Flat organization with plenty of room for growth, challenge, & additional leadership & growth opportunities Remote work & flex environment Competitive compensation, full- medical, dental, vision & Pre-IPO equity - we very likely will go public or have a liquidity event within 3 years Opportunity to join a company that is making huge strides in the booming e-Legal space', ' Remote work & flex environment', ' Experience with either Airflow or Pandas & Django is a must', ' SQL experience is good', ' Competitive compensation, full- medical, dental, vision & Pre-IPO equity - we very likely will go public or have a liquidity event within 3 years', " You will be a important part of the engineering team, making a huge impact on our scalable, flagship software product Our product is extremely data intensive - you'll be working with large amounts of data & the latest data technology to help build out our data stream and platform Working on tech like Docker, Python, Kubernetes, Django, Keras, nltk, sklearn, deep learning, NLP", " Machine learning framework experience i.e.: sklearn, keras, nltk & the underlying algo's for NLP & Deep Learning are all helpful", ' Data visualization would be great', ' Experience with data mining, machine learning, statistics, deep learning, NLP, etc are a plus', ' Flat organization with plenty of room for growth, challenge, & additional leadership & growth opportunities', ' Some experience with tech such as Docker, Kubernetes, Django would be great', 'Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : JK-1601371 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***', 'Your Right to Work', 'Optello is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer', ' Data expertise - identifying data patterns, troubleshoot data, etc.', ' Working on tech like Docker, Python, Kubernetes, Django, Keras, nltk, sklearn, deep learning, NLP', ' You will be a important part of the engineering team, making a huge impact on our scalable, flagship software product', ' Startup experience & mentality', ' Kaggle competition experience gives you a leg up', ' BS/BA in Math, physics, stats, Computer Science, etc. (MS or PhD preferred) with 3+ years of dedicated production data engineering experience', ' Experience with PostgresSQL', ' Must have Python programming experience', " Our product is extremely data intensive - you'll be working with large amounts of data & the latest data technology to help build out our data stream and platform", ' Opportunity to join a company that is making huge strides in the booming e-Legal space']

['', 'Come Change How The World Works.', 'You creatively answer questions, Take us through a story about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation.', 'You have broadened mastery over several user research methods', 'You Can Really Knock Our Socks Off If', 'Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals.', 'Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts.', 'Facilitate and participate in workshops, make sure teams ideate with a user empathy in mind.', ' Be a core member of the Product team, ensuring User Research helps us meet our strategic business and user experience goals. Nurture our backlog of learning opportunities. And, own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies. Study our diverse global user-base, crafting studies to test designs remotely and in different cultural contexts. Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Hire and collaborate with hand-picked freelance researchers. Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Facilitate and participate in workshops, make sure teams ideate with a user empathy in mind. Translate customer insights into meaningful recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis workshops ', 'You can communicate the lessons you learned from failed projects. It happens to all of us! We want to know what you learned?', 'You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points.', 'You can draw broad connections and use your insights to influence executives and increase user empathy', "You're able to speak to design principles and language principles fluently", 'Translate customer insights into meaningful recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You can dig into thick data and find gold! You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', "You'll Catch Our Eye If", 'Nurture our backlog of learning opportunities. And, own the end-to-end planning and execution of research studies.', 'Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies.', ' You have broadened mastery over several user research methods You can demonstrate how you set the bar for engaging with peers and other disciplines, building positive relationships with executives You can show us how you communicated sophisticated concepts and gain traction on hard to tackle problems. You\'re able to speak to design principles and language principles fluently You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You can draw broad connections and use your insights to influence executives and increase user empathy You work effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. ', 'You work effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You creatively answer questions, Take us through a story about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation. You can communicate the lessons you learned from failed projects. It happens to all of us! We want to know what you learned? You are comfortable facilitating participatory thinking workshops. You can dig into thick data and find gold! You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics. ', 'You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions.', 'You are comfortable facilitating participatory thinking workshops.', 'Be responsible for conducting the right research, using the right methodologies, in the right time. Hire and collaborate with hand-picked freelance researchers.', 'Your Responsibilities', 'Advocate research findings to diverse audiences through written reports, in-person presentations, or facilitation of co-synthesis workshops', 'You can show us how you communicated sophisticated concepts and gain traction on hard to tackle problems.', 'You can demonstrate how you set the bar for engaging with peers and other disciplines, building positive relationships with executives']

['', 'Experience with notebook-based Data Science workflow.', 'Partner with leadership, engineers, program managers and data scientists to understand data needs.Design, build and launch extremely efficient and reliable data pipelines to move data across a number of platforms including Data Warehouse, online caches and real-time systems.Communicate, at scale, through multiple mediums: Presentations, dashboards, company-wide datasets, bots and more.Educate your partners: Use your data and analytics experience to ‘see what’s missing’, identifying and addressing gaps in their existing logging and processes.Leverage data and business principles to solve large scale web, mobile and data infrastructure problems.Build data expertise and own data quality for your areas.', 'Leverage data Luigi, Prefect, Dagster, digdag.io, Google Cloud Composer, AWS Step Functions, Azure Data Factory, UC4, Control-M).', '5+ years experience in custom ETL design, implementation and maintenance.', 'Experience with more than one coding language.', '5+ years of SQL experience.', 'Experience with Airflow.', '5+ years of Python development experience.5+ years of SQL experience.3+ years of Data Modeling.Experience analyzing data to discover opportunities and address gaps.5+ years experience in custom ETL design, implementation and maintenance.Experience working with cloud or on-prem Big Data/MPP analytics platform(i.e. Netezza, Teradata, AWS Redshift, Google BigQuery, Azure Data Warehouse, or similar).', 'Experience with data quality and validation.', 'Experience with more than one Warehouse, or similar).', 'Experience querying massive datasets using Spark, Presto, Hive, Impala, etc.', 'Experience analyzing data to discover opportunities and address gaps.', 'Educate your partners: Use your data and analytics experience to ‘see what’s missing’, identifying and addressing gaps in their existing logging and processes.', 'Experience with designing and implementing real-time pipelines.']

['', 'Experience working on the evaluation and engineering of display electronics and controllers.', 'Derive novel experimental and/or modeling approaches to assess the impact of luminance, color, spatial and temporal properties impact visual quality in AR/VR.', 'Conduct research in display engineering and how novel display, and/or optical systems can impact perceived image quality.Derive novel experimental and/or modeling approaches to assess the impact of luminance, color, spatial and temporal properties impact visual quality in AR/VR.Work with cross-functional partners in research and product development to understand and prioritize perceptual needs.Employ existing knowledge of human sensory encoding and display quality metrics to help guide engineering efforts towards effective display, optical, and rendering solutions.Detect & identify possible perceptual artifacts that can arise from novel prototypical displays from architectural specifications and proposals.Communicate the findings from modeling, psychophysics, & empirical experiments to help set target requirements for display systems in AR/VR.', 'PhD in vision science, perceptual psychology, optics, computational imaging, biomedical engineering, or a related field with an emphasis on perceptual modeling, psychophysics, and/or metrics evaluating perceptual performance.2+ years of postdoctoral training, or industry experience conducting research investigating perceptual issues with displays, or visual processing.Academic background in spatio-temporal contrast sensitivity, low-level vision, color perception, retinal physiology and/or modeling.Experience working on the evaluation and engineering of display electronics and controllers.Knowledge of standard image quality metrics, and deriving new metrics for novel environments and/or display architectures.Knowledge of the complete image processing pipeline, from capture through reproduction through professional experience, publications and/or academic training.3+ years experience in hardware design and prototyping hardware systems to simulate issues with proposed and novel display and hardware architecture.Experience in working on team that ships product.', 'Knowledge of the complete image processing pipeline, from capture through reproduction through professional experience, publications and/or academic training.', 'Knowledge of how display characteristics interact with visual encoding processes in the generation of visual artifacts.', '2+ years of postdoctoral training, or industry experience conducting research investigating perceptual issues with displays, or visual processing.', 'Detect & identify possible perceptual artifacts that can arise from novel prototypical displays from architectural specifications and proposals.', '2+ years experience with MATLAB, Python, or similar program for stimulus display and analysis.', 'Academic background in spatio-temporal contrast sensitivity, low-level vision, color perception, retinal physiology and/or modeling.', 'PhD in vision science, perceptual psychology, optics, computational imaging, biomedical engineering, or a related field with an emphasis on perceptual modeling, psychophysics, and/or metrics evaluating perceptual performance.', 'Communicate the findings from modeling, psychophysics, & empirical experiments to help set target requirements for display systems in AR/VR.', 'Conduct research in display engineering and how novel display, and/or optical systems can impact perceived image quality.', 'Experience in working on team that ships product.', 'Knowledge of standard image quality metrics, and deriving new metrics for novel environments and/or display architectures.', 'Advanced Degree in vision science, perceptual psychology, optics, computational imaging, biomedical engineering, or a related field with an emphasis on perceptual modeling, psychophysics, and/or metrics evaluating perceptual performance.', 'Work with cross-functional partners in research and product development to understand and prioritize perceptual needs.', 'Employ existing knowledge of human sensory encoding and display quality metrics to help guide engineering efforts towards effective display, optical, and rendering solutions.', '3+ years experience in hardware design and prototyping hardware systems to simulate issues with proposed and novel display and hardware architecture.', 'Experience with research publicized in high-impact journals and international conference presentations or publications.', 'Advanced Degree in vision science, perceptual psychology, optics, computational imaging, biomedical engineering, or a related field with an emphasis on perceptual modeling, psychophysics, and/or metrics evaluating perceptual performance.Knowledge of how display characteristics interact with visual encoding processes in the generation of visual artifacts.2+ years experience with MATLAB, Python, or similar program for stimulus display and analysis.Experience with research publicized in high-impact journals and international conference presentations or publications.']

Conduct strategic to tactical research -- from foundational research to refine our understanding of personas and use cases, all the way to concept and usability testing. Employ a range of qualitative and quantitative methodologies. Facilitate and participate in workshops, make sure teams ideate with a user empathy in mind. Translate customer insights into meaningful recommendations. Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action. It happens to all of us! Communicate insights within the product and engineering teams in a format that inspires action.', 'You can dig into thick data and find gold! You have defined, deployed, monitored, and revised UX metrics.', "You'll Catch Our Eye If", 'Nurture our backlog of learning opportunities. You\'re able to speak to design principles and language principles fluently You can visualize research insights in ways that go beyond “bullet points," but know when to deliver just bullet points. You can draw broad connections and use your insights to influence executives and increase user empathy You work effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams. ', 'You work effectively collaborating with distributed remote teams.', ' You are always thinking “What should we learn”, ensuring that we answer the “not yet articulated” questions. You creatively answer questions, Take us through a story about a research method that went beyond interviews, concept validation. You can communicate the lessons you learned from failed projects. It happens to all of us! We want to know what you learned? You are comfortable facilitating participatory thinking workshops. You can dig into thick data and find gold! job_title: Data Scientist, Product Analytics - Epidemic Response
job_text: ['', 'Proven machine learning sense in building robust modelsBackground in data privacy issuesExperience in querying and manipulating large datasets for analysis (with Python and SQL)', 'Validate and analyze the data for the external datasets that we produce to shape our perspective on the accuracy and value of the data', 'Generalize our Pandemic Response data strategy and ideate for additional metrics that can help us expand beyond our existing surveys and data for application for future global epidemics as well as for future public health causes', 'BS, MS or PhD Degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Econometrics, or similar domain', 'Work closely with partnerships, Product Management and cross functional teams and third party organizations (academics, global health organizations) to maximize the value of the data that we produce', 'Experience working independently and as a member of a cross-functional team', 'Identify public/private collaborations that can accelerate research/understanding around public health outcomes and the role Facebook can play here', 'Background in data privacy issues', 'Experience in querying and manipulating large datasets for analysis (with Python and SQL)', 'Experience taking highly ambiguous problems (including emergent problems in the world) and forming a structured opinion on what we should do', 'BS, MS or PhD Degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Econometrics, or similar domain5+ years of experience working in an analytics organization5+ years of experience working with Health data and Health organizationsExperience working independently and as a member of a cross-functional teamExperience working with academia and public health organizationsExperience taking highly ambiguous problems (including emergent problems in the world) and forming a structured opinion on what we should doExperience communicating effectively to stakeholders, including executives, external leaders in the Health space, and other DS on the Health team', 'Experience working with academia and public health organizations', 'Identify existing external data that can help form Facebook’s strategy in the Health space broadly as well as improve our already existing investments in the Health space', 'Validate and analyze the data for the external datasets that we produce to shape our perspective on the accuracy and value of the dataWork closely with partnerships, Product Management and cross functional teams and third party organizations (academics, global health organizations) to maximize the value of the data that we produceIdentify public/private collaborations that can accelerate research/understanding around public health outcomes and the role Facebook can play hereGeneralize our Pandemic Response data strategy and ideate for additional metrics that can help us expand beyond our existing surveys and data for application for future global epidemics as well as for future public health causesIdentify existing external data that can help form Facebook’s strategy in the Health space broadly as well as improve our already existing investments in the Health space', '5+ years of experience working with Health data and Health organizations', 'Proven machine learning sense in building robust models', '5+ years of experience working in an analytics organization', 'Experience communicating effectively to stakeholders, including executives, external leaders in the Health space, and other DS on the Health team']

job_text: ['', '3+ years of experience with polarization aberration analysis and polarization ray tracing of optical systems', '3+ years of industry experience in applied research and/or product development of optical systems requiring any combination of the following: imaging, illumination, physical optics, polarization optics, stray light analysis or holography', 'Masters degree or equivalent experience in the field of Optical Sciences, Optical Engineering, Physics, Electrical Engineering, or a similar field', 'Masters degree or equivalent experience in the field of Optical Sciences, Optical Engineering, Physics, Electrical Engineering, or a similar fieldUnderstanding of polarization optics, polarization ray tracing and polarization aberration analysis3+ years of industry experience in applied research and/or product development of optical systems requiring any combination of the following: imaging, illumination, physical optics, polarization optics, stray light analysis or holography3+ years of experience with polarization aberration analysis and polarization ray tracing of optical systems5+ years of experience with design optical tools such as Zemax, CODE V, FRED, or ASAP5+ years of experience with polarization optics and physical optics modeling tools, such as MATLAB, Python, COMSOL, and methods such as Jones Matrix, FDTD, or RCWA, etc.', '5 years of industry experience in applying existing and emerging optical technologies, and incubating an idea from concept validation to system improvement of NEDs', 'Design and Model critical technologies to drive system performance and to validate achievable experience', 'PhD degree or equivalent experience in the field of Optical Sciences, Optical Engineering, Physics, Electrical Engineering or a similar field', 'Develop new concepts and technologies for next generation Near-Eye Displays (NEDs).
